languages.text: "Обманул? Обманывают равных — тобой я распорядился. Ты в точности исполнил{mf||а} отведенную тебе роль — был{mf||а} именно там, где тебе было положено быть, и сделал{mf||а} именно то, что было задумано. Кроме того, чтобы умереть".

"Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."
languages.original_text: "Обманул? Обманывают равных — тобой я распорядился. Ты в точности исполнил{mf||а} отведенную тебе роль — был{mf||а} именно там, где тебе было положено быть, и сделал{mf||а} именно то, что было задумано. Кроме того, чтобы умереть".

traits.locale_text: "Deceived? One deceives their equal — I exploited you. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were meant to do. Except for dying."

"Deceived? One deceives their equal — I exploited you. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were meant to do. Except for dying."

"Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

"Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

"Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

languages.text: 「騙しただと？力が同じ者であれば騙したことになるだろうが、お前のことは利用したにすぎない。お前はよくやってくれたーいるべき場所で、やるべきことをやってくれたよ。死ぬことを除いてな」
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: 「騙しただと？力が同じ者であれば騙したことになるだろうが、お前のことは利用したにすぎない。お前はよくやってくれたーいるべき場所で、やるべきことをやってくれたよ。死ぬことを除いてな」

languages.text: “欺骗？只有实力相当的对手才谈得上欺骗，我仅仅是利用了你而已。你完美地扮演了我希望你扮演的角色，完美地出现在我需要你出现的地点，完美地完成了我希望你完成的事情。唯一遗憾的事情，就是你还活着。”
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: “欺骗？只有实力相当的对手才谈得上欺骗，我仅仅是利用了你而已。你完美地扮演了我希望你扮演的角色，完美地出现在我需要你出现的地点，完美地完成了我希望你完成的事情。唯一遗憾的事情，就是你还活着。”

languages.text: «¿Que te engañé? Los engaños son para los iguales. A ti te he utilizado. Has ejecutado tu papel a la perfección: estabas donde tenías que estar e hiciste lo que debías hacer. Excepto morir».
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que te engañé? Los engaños son para los iguales. A ti te he utilizado. Has ejecutado tu papel a la perfección: estabas donde tenías que estar e hiciste lo que debías hacer. Excepto morir».

languages.text: « Menti ? On peut mentir à son égal... mais dans votre cas, je me suis simplement servi de vous. Vous avez joué votre rôle à la perfection. Vous étiez au bon endroit, au bon moment, et vous vous êtes {mf|comporté|comportée} exactement comme je le souhaitais. Ou presque, vu que vous êtes encore en vie. »
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: « Menti ? On peut mentir à son égal... mais dans votre cas, je me suis simplement servi de vous. Vous avez joué votre rôle à la perfection. Vous étiez au bon endroit, au bon moment, et vous vous êtes {mf|comporté|comportée} exactement comme je le souhaitais. Ou presque, vu que vous êtes encore en vie. »

languages.text: "Getäuscht? Ebenbürtige kann man täuschen – Euch habe ich lediglich benutzt. Ihr habt die Euch zugeteilte Rolle perfekt gespielt – Ihr wart genau dort, wo Ihr sein solltet, und habt genau das getan, was Ihr tun solltet. Nur gestorben seid Ihr nicht."
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: "Getäuscht? Ebenbürtige kann man täuschen – Euch habe ich lediglich benutzt. Ihr habt die Euch zugeteilte Rolle perfekt gespielt – Ihr wart genau dort, wo Ihr sein solltet, und habt genau das getan, was Ihr tun solltet. Nur gestorben seid Ihr nicht."

languages.text: "Tuzağa mı? Ancak denklerimi tuzağa düşürürüm. Seniyse yalnızca kullandım. Sana verdiğim görevi harfiyen yerine getirdin. Tam da olman gereken yerdeydin, yapman gereken her şeyi yaptın. Geriye bir tek ölmek kaldı."
languages.original_text: "Deceived? Equals can be deceived — but you I merely used. You played the part given to you perfectly — you were exactly where you were supposed to be, and did exactly what you were supposed to do. Everything except die."

traits.locale_text: "Tuzağa mı? Ancak denklerimi tuzağa düşürürüm. Seniyse yalnızca kullandım. Sana verdiğim görevi harfiyen yerine getirdin. Tam da olman gereken yerdeydin, yapman gereken her şeyi yaptın. Geriye bir tek ölmek kaldı."
